Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: You can spend much more time with GenAI once it has been trained (documents upload for example), summarising or explaining complex ideas or content in sumple language and then with increasing difficulty as you grasp the content. It has been incredibly helpful.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: It depends on the content, subjective business strategy is different to data science!
